title: Emilio Sánchez
text:
Hi, my name is Emilio Sánchez and I’m completing my Master’s in Landscape Ecology with a focus on restoration ecology, remote sensing, and soil ecology. My core interests lie in remote sensing, data science, and programming — alongside a deep passion for botany and plant ecology.

Explore My Work
